column1: Thank you to the hundreds of Iowans who joined today’s #IA03 coronavirus telephone town hall! If we didn’t get a chance to get to your question, make sure you write to my office so we can get you an answer: https://axne.house.gov/contact

Ashton says it best. Encourage Iowans to take the #TestIowaChallenge. It's fast and simple at https://www.testiowa.com/. One out of every 79 Iowans has been tested for coronavirus since the first COVID-19 case was reported.Take the test and help Iowa #CrushTheCurve!
This is really amazing. Zero deaths in #Vietnam due to #COVID19 #coronavirus
Too bad liberalism isn't as contagious as coronavirus. Maybe we'd be in a much better place in society if it were.
